abstract: Returns the line style for the given data value. Returns `nil` if the line style scale is unavailable, or the value is invalid.

declaration.code:
func lineStyle

(for value: P) -> StrokeStyle? where P : Plottable

overview:
## Return Value

The line style corresponding to the data value, or `nil` if the data value is incompatible with the chart.
rawMarkdown:
--- source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/Charts/ChartProxy/lineStyle(for:) crawled: 2025-12-02T07:07:00Z --- # lineStyle(for:) **Instance Method** Returns the line style for the given data value. Returns `nil` if the line style scale is unavailable, or the value is invalid. ## Declaration ```swift func lineStyle

(for value: P) -> StrokeStyle? where P : Plottable ``` ## Parameters - **value**: The data value. ## Return Value The line style corresponding to the data value, or `nil` if the data value is incompatible with the chart.
title: lineStyle(for:)
